text:
A 15-year-old girl was allegedly abducted and raped in a car by a juvenile on the Gohana-Delhi road on Thursday, the police said on Saturday.

A case of rape has been registered against the 17-year-old youth.

The girl, a Class IX student, said in her complaint that as she was going for her tuition class, the accused abducted and raped her in his car and dropped her near Sukhpura Chowk here around 10 p.m. on Thursday. She informed her family of the incident.
title: Girl abducted, raped by juvenile
